description: This file provides utility classes for handling JSON serialization/deserialization of Note objects and defines color presets used for notes in the UI.

classes.name: NoteJson
classes.description: Provides static methods for encoding and decoding Note objects to and from JSON, including lists of notes.

classes.name: NoteColors
classes.description: Defines static color constants and color swatches used as labels for notes in the UI.

methods.name: encode
methods.description: Converts a Note object into a JSON string.

methods.name: decode
methods.description: Creates a Note object from a JSON string.

methods.name: encodeList
methods.description: Converts a list of Note objects into a JSON string.

methods.name: decodeList
methods.description: Creates a list of Note objects from a JSON string representing a list.
